query:
SELECT p.id, p.name, p.categoryId, c.name as category_name 
FROM products p
LEFT JOIN categories c ON p.categoryId = c.id
WHERE p.slug IN ('falafel-fladenbrot', 'falafel-yufka', 'falafel-teller');
command:
